üîó Queensland researchers say evidence linking social media to youth mental health problems is ‘weak’

Ms Patterson has more than one million followers across TikTok and Instagram.

The Syndeysider said the federal government‚Äôs ban is ‚Äúabsolutely pointless‚Äù.

Whilst she‚Äôs not one of the researchers initially quoted in the article, I‚Äôm not convinced she‚Äôs not biased in her assessment of good or bad in this case.

We‚Äôve not had a disruption in competitive golf, LIV was aimed at the PGA‚Äôs dominance, not golf itself.

items.title: üì∫ Favourite TV shows from 2024
items.content_html:
There‚Äôs were plenty of good TV shows released last year, here‚Äôs a list of my favourites in no particular order;

Sh≈çgun

When a mysterious European ship is found marooned in a nearby Japanese fishing village, Lord Yoshii Toranaga discovers secrets that could tip the scales of power and devastate his enemies.

The Penguin

Following the events of The Batman (2022), Oz Cobb, a.k.a. the Penguin, makes a play to seize the reins of the crime world in Gotham.

Secret Level

Original stories set within the worlds of iconic video games are featured in this animated anthology series.

Black Doves

Helen embarks on a passionate affair with a man who has no idea what her secret identity is.

The Day of The Jackal

The Jackal is an elusive assassin who makes his living carrying out hits for the highest fee.

Slow Horses - Season 2

Follows a team of British intelligence agents who serve as a dumping ground department of MI5 due to their career-ending mistakes.

Hysteria

Follows a struggling high school heavy metal band of outcasts who use the town’s sudden interest in the occult to start a reputation as a Satanic metal band, until a strange series of events triggers a witch hunt that leads back to them.

Honourable mentions go to Fake, Creature Commandos, The Agency, Twilight Of The Gods, Landman and The Second Best Hospital in the Galaxy.

For reference, here’s a list of the TV shows released in 2024 on IMDB.
items.content_text:
There‚Äôs were plenty of good TV shows released last year, here‚Äôs a list of my favourites in no particular order;

[Sh≈çgun](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2788316/) 

> When a mysterious European ship is found marooned in a nearby Japanese fishing village, Lord Yoshii Toranaga discovers secrets that could tip the scales of power and devastate his enemies. 

[The Penguin](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15435876/)

> Following the events of The Batman (2022), Oz Cobb, a.k.a. the Penguin, makes a play to seize the reins of the crime world in Gotham.

[Secret Level](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt33204697/) 

> Original stories set within the worlds of iconic video games are featured in this animated anthology series.

[Black Doves](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt27995113/)

> Helen embarks on a passionate affair with a man who has no idea what her secret identity is. 

[The Day of The Jackal](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt24053860/)

> The Jackal is an elusive assassin who makes his living carrying out hits for the highest fee. 

[Slow Horses](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5875444/) - Season 2

> Follows a team of British intelligence agents who serve as a dumping ground department of MI5 due to their career-ending mistakes.

[Hysteria](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt21493708/)

> Follows a struggling high school heavy metal band of outcasts who use the town's sudden interest in the occult to start a reputation as a Satanic metal band, until a strange series of events triggers a witch hunt that leads back to them.


Honourable mentions go to [Fake](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt29120226/), [Creature Commandos](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt26545355/), [The Agency](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt26656917/), [Twilight Of The Gods](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5875444/), [Landman](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt14186672/) and [The Second Best Hospital in the Galaxy](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11828386/).


For reference, here's [a list of the TV shows released in 2024](https://www.imdb.com/search/title/?title_type=tv_series&release_date=2024-01-01,2024-12-31&sort=release_date,asc) on IMDB.

items.content_html:
üé• Watched: Longlegs (2024)

FBI Agent Lee Harker is a gifted new recruit assigned to the unsolved case of an elusive serial killer. As the case takes complex turns, unearthing evidence of the occult, Harker discovers a personal connection to the merciless killer and must race against time to stop him before he claims the lives of another innocent family.

Kinda meh, despite Nicholas Cage being quite creepy as the killer. 2/5

‚ÄòDisgraceful‚Äô: Newspaper‚Äôs unforgivable front page Gout Gout blunder

‚ÄúWe sincerely apologise to Peter Bol and Gout Gout for the error made during the cropping of a photo featuring both athletes,‚Äù the statement read.

Peter Bol is 30, Gout Gout is 16, they do not look like each other. Massive fail by The Sunday Age.

üì∞

3.5 / 5

items.content_html: I’ve hit peak burnout, and peak frustration, so I’m tapping out on the rest of the year. So much of my time is chewed up volunteering, it used to be rewarding, but now I’m the default person that everyone goes to it’s become a 7 days a week thing, that’s not fair or remotely equitable.
items.content_text: I've hit peak burnout, and peak frustration, so I'm tapping out on the rest of the year. So much of my time is chewed up volunteering, it used to be rewarding, but now I'm the _default_ person that everyone goes to it's become a 7 days a week thing, that's not fair or remotely equitable.

items.title: It‚Äôs Fishing & Crabbing We Go, Sea Shanty
items.content_html:
When your wife challenges you to write a sea shanty after seeing your shared calendar notification, you take that challenge‚Ä¶and then maybe you cheat a little a use ChatGPT because after all, you‚Äôre not a song writer üòú

üé£ ü¶Ä

Hi ho, hi ho, it‚Äôs fishing and crabbing we go, With nets in hand, we‚Äôll scour the sand, Hi ho, hi ho!

Hi ho, hi ho, the tides they ebb and flow, We‚Äôll cast our lines and haul the brines, For fishing and crabbing we go!

The salty breeze, it fills the seas, Our traps and bait below, We‚Äôll fill the hold with tales untold, From fishing and crabbing we go!

Hi ho, hi ho, it‚Äôs fishing and crabbing we go, The ocean‚Äôs call, we‚Äôll heed it all, Hi ho, hi ho!

üé£ ü¶Ä
items.content_text:
When your wife challenges you to write a sea shanty after seeing your [shared calendar notification](https://mathewpacker.com/uploads/2024/media.jpg), you take that challenge‚Ä¶and then maybe you cheat a little a use ChatGPT because after all, you‚Äôre not a song writer üòú 

üé£ ü¶Ä

Hi ho, hi ho, it‚Äôs fishing and crabbing we go,
With nets in hand, we‚Äôll scour the sand,
Hi ho, hi ho!

Hi ho, hi ho, the tides they ebb and flow,
We‚Äôll cast our lines and haul the brines,
For fishing and crabbing we go!

The salty breeze, it fills the seas,
Our traps and bait below,
We‚Äôll fill the hold with tales untold,
From fishing and crabbing we go!

Hi ho, hi ho, it‚Äôs fishing and crabbing we go,
The ocean‚Äôs call, we‚Äôll heed it all,
Hi ho, hi ho! 

üé£ ü¶Ä

items.content_html:
We used to have Stars, Celebrities, and Personalities, in various fields, be it movies, tv, music, sports, etc. Nowadays, according to most media outlets, everyone seemingly is called a Star.

My question would be, if everyone is a star, is anyone actually a star?
items.content_text:
We used to have Stars, Celebrities, and Personalities, in various fields, be it movies, tv, music, sports, etc. Nowadays, according to most media outlets, everyone seemingly is called a Star.

My question would be, if everyone is a star, is anyone actually a star?

items.title: The Week Ahead
items.content_html:
Looks to be pretty busy, but shouldn‚Äôt be too stressful if things go to plan. ü§û

Monday - finish clearing the garage and make a couple of tip runs

Tuesday - setup golf sim in the garage, football meeting at 5pm, sports club board meeting at 6pm

Wednesday - take the boat out on Lake Macquarie, try to catch some fish and crabs for Sunday BBQ

Thursday - same as Wednesday

Friday - same as Wednesday, if I haven‚Äôt caught enough for the Sunday BBQ, otherwise play some golf

Saturday - no plans

Sunday - early trial match between between my sons team and Singleton Under 18‚Äôs, then family Christmas BBQ

Plenty on, nothing stressful, let‚Äôs go!

items.title: Flawed Decision Making
items.content_html:
None of this passes the sniff test‚Ä¶

Thursday‚Äôs inquiry into the new laws ran for just three hours, with Australians given only a day to lodge submissions.

The government has said it will rely on some form of age-verification technology to implement the restrictions but the details are vague and the technology has not been finalised.

The onus will be on social media companies to add age-verification tools themselves.

The ban involves the highest age limit set by any country, and does not include exemptions for those with parental consent.

There will be no penalties for parents or children who ignore the rules.

I don‚Äôt understand why we are rushing this through? What is being hidden in the legislation? How will the age verification work? How can you determine that I am over the age of 16? Does this become a way to have a national ID system?

Lots of questions, absolutely no answers!

üîó Australia approves social media ban
items.content_text:
None of this passes the sniff test‚Ä¶

> Thursday‚Äôs inquiry into the new laws ran for just three hours, with Australians given only a day to lodge submissions.

> The government has said it will rely on some form of age-verification technology to implement the restrictions but the details are vague and the technology has not been finalised. 

> The onus will be on social media companies to add age-verification tools themselves.

> The ban involves the highest age limit set by any country, and does not include exemptions for those with parental consent.

> There will be no penalties for parents or children who ignore the rules.

I don‚Äôt understand why we are rushing this through?
What is being hidden in the legislation? 
How will the age verification work?
How can you determine that I am over the age of 16?
Does this become a way to have a national ID system?

Lots of questions, absolutely no answers!

üîó [Australia approves social media ban](https://www.news.com.au/technology/australias-senate-approves-worlds-strictest-social-media-ban-for-children-and-teens/news-story/db73e16094f683af8731e3ab0949ea9c)

items.content_html:
Australia’s Actual Deadliest Animal

NCIS found horses killed more people than any other animal in Australia and were responsible for more than 200 deaths over a two-decade period.

So we can now stop all the demonising of sharks, snakes, spiders, stonefish, jellyfish, the blue ring octopus, and all our other little Australian creatures… shit, we have a fair amount of deadly critters here!

PS. Daryl Braithwaite has got some explaining to do…
items.content_text:
[Australia's Actual Deadliest Animal](https://www.news.com.au/technology/science/animals/a-new-report-has-revealed-australias-deadliest-animal-and-it-is-not-what-you-would-expect/news-story/e2afd1ce4c176718a54c3971dfc50690)

> NCIS found horses killed more people than any other animal in Australia and were responsible for more than 200 deaths over a two-decade period.

So we can now stop all the demonising of sharks, snakes, spiders, stonefish, jellyfish, the blue ring octopus, and all our other little Australian creatures... shit, we have a fair amount of deadly critters here!

PS. [Daryl Braithwaite](https://youtu.be/lnigc08J6FI?si=zRzmwKCICsGB9lgf) has got some explaining to do...

items.title: Alder Park Sports Club AGM
items.content_html:
I‚Äôve got my first AGM as Treasurer of Alder Park Sports Club this morning, and whilst I‚Äôll be delivering a positive report, my nerves are an absolute train wreck this morning‚Ä¶

Update:

Well that was a major non-event! To hold the meeting we needed to reach a quorum of 25 members, only 16 members showed, including 7 of 9 Board Members.

So now we reconvene next Sunday and as long as more than 2 people arrive, the meeting will go ahead.
items.content_text:
I‚Äôve got my first AGM as Treasurer of Alder Park Sports Club this morning, and whilst I‚Äôll be delivering a positive report, my nerves are an absolute train wreck this morning‚Ä¶ 

---

Update:

Well that was a major non-event! To hold the meeting we needed to reach a quorum of 25 members, only 16 members showed, including 7 of 9 Board Members. 

So now we reconvene next Sunday and as long as more than 2 people arrive, the meeting will go ahead.

items.content_html:

items.content_text:
At New Lambton Eagles‚Äô end of season presentation event yesterday, I was awarded Life Membership.

It‚Äôs brilliant to be recognised for the contribution I‚Äôve made to the Club over the last 10 years. I think I‚Äôve held just about every position in the Club, from when Travis was in MiniRoos in 2015 through to Under 15‚Äôs PYL now.

In that time I‚Äôve been a Coach, Manager, Registrar, Groundsmen, Uniform Coordinator, Equipment Coordinator, Game Day Coordinator, Social Media Coordinator, Premier Youth League Boys Coordinator, Club Photographer, IT/IS Manager, and Vice President.

Crazy! ü§™

Looking forward, I‚Äôd like to keep doing the VP role for another year, along with having greater involvement in the NPL Men‚Äôs Program. We‚Äôll see what shakes out at the AGM next month, which sort of times in with the new NPL Men‚Äôs squad‚Äôs first session.

Go the Eagles! ü¶Ö

items.title: Safe Social Media & Kids
items.content_html:
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
items.content_text:
üîó The Instagram Changes Are Not Enough

I think the solution to keep minors safe on social media requires a combination of social media companies, hardware companies, and parents.

It's easy to point the finger and demand a Government response to the growing issue of online safety for kids on social media, and of course they should play a part in it.

However, as we are the ones that buy our kids mobile devices that access these social media networks, we need to take responsibility and be the ones that are managing how our kids are accessing these ones.

I'm not kidding myself for one second thinking that our kids won't try and find a way around whatever restrictions we apply, but if we're not trying and we're just passing the buck, then what example are we setting for our kids.

items.title: üé• Watched: Leave the World Behind
items.content_html:
Netflix has the worst volume differential between the dialogue and the music in their movies.

If you adjust the volume so the music doesn’t blow your ears out, you can’t hear the dialogue, so you turn it up and some more music plays and it’s loud as fuck!

Ugh I’m so old! üòú

<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
items.content_text:
WordPress.org bans WP Engine, blocks it from accessing its resources

WordPress drama went up another notch on Wednesday after WordPress.org, the open-source web hosting software, banned hosting provider WP Engine from accessing its resources.

Well that escalated rapidly!

You'd hate to be a WP Engine customer at the moment, caught in the middle of the drama, not being able to auto-update plugins, wondering whether to move to a different host, or even a different platform!

This will get worse before it gets better, I'm not confident WordPress or WP Engine will make smart decisions here.

‚òπÔ∏è

¬†
